title: Talkback: a study in communication
creator_credit: Anthony Pelissier, Ian Latimer and Rank Audio Visual
brief_description: This film presents a dramatised case study of communication within a factory. It shows a cross section of managers, and demonstrates how each has a particular responsibility for ensuring that communication at work is effective communication.
creator_credit_for_label: Anthony Pelissier, Ian Latimer and Rank Audio Visual
